entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Quaqtaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:21 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -18.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quaqtaq Airport 3:00 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -18.4°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -20.6°C
Wind: NW 30 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blizzard developing near midnight. Blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
